Articles.Content: Ahwyisssss, here we go!
the store WORKS NOW!!!!
Website showing update now. Downloading...
It all happened so quickly this time. In the 0.24 HypeTrain we were all monitoring SteamDB and watching it build up, this time it just... came
caught a 0.25, am i allowed to keep it!?

If you're browsing the forum right now, stop what you're doing, and download KSP 0.25!

-Khorso
you mean for once the Store is ahead of steam?
There were some issues with the build server, but I believe they are resolved now? If not then please hold for a few more minutes
Store download is up **WARNING VAB DESTRUCTION IMMINENT, I REPEAT VAB DESTRUCTION IMMINENT!**

There were some issues with the build server, but I believe they are resolved now? If not then please hold for a few more minutes

Steam update queued and updated. Game still reports 0.24.2.

Hype-town looks very wierd.

If you're browsing the forum right now, stop what you're doing, and download KSP 0.25!

-Khorso

where is it on the kerbal website for all of us who bought it pre-steam! I want to be first!
Rubble rubble rubble!
Game loaded, but it's 0.24.5999 and no admin building or difficulty settings

sooooo... I've got the admin facility but none of the new parts.

Yes I'm in sandbox mode
Umm... So, I don't seem to have the SP+ parts in my game. It's on 0.25, x64, I have difficulty options, and all other new stuff, but no SP+ parts. What up?

How compatible are the old mods, and how easy would it be for someone to update them themselves?

By that I mean are authors going to have to make code changes, or like a few other games do someone just need update a few lines in a config?

Maybe I should just wait a while for everything to get fixed.

Waiting.

Still waiting...

it hurts aaaaa
Please double check you're on 0.25 in the main menu. There were some issues with the build server.

Game loaded, but it's 0.24.5999 and no admin building or difficulty settings

Same here. Wonder if Squad uploaded the right build file or steam transposed them.

- - - Updated - - -

Please double check you're on 0.25 in the main menu. There were some issues with the build server.

If we had an update queued, and downloaded, and updated, but the main screen still shows prior version what do we do?
I updated on Steam, I have 24.2, no new stuff?

Same here. Wonder if Squad uploaded the right build file or steam transposed them.

- - - Updated - - -

If we had an update queued, and downloaded, and updated, but the main screen still shows prior version what do we do?

Wait for an update here. I'll tell you as soon as 0.25 is available on Steam.

Please double check you're on 0.25 in the main menu. There were some issues with the build server.

Steam verifies build 403481 but main menu still reports 0.24.2.559. Even cleaned everything out and did a fresh install.

Edit: Waiting patiently per instruction!

Steam verifies build 403481 but main menu still reports 0.24.2.559. Even cleaned everything out and did a fresh install.

They're working on it

Umm... So, I don't seem to have the SP+ parts in my game. It's on 0.25, x64, I have difficulty options, and all other new stuff, but no SP+ parts. What up?

I'm guessing the 64 bit thing just downloaded the 64 bit executable, not everything else.
my build showing 0.25 but yeah things missing
